name: 運動與脂質代謝專題研究
description: 本課程主要在探討人體運動及身體活動時脂質代謝的變化，其中包含單次與長期運動及身體活動介入對脂肪組織的影響，除了深化脂質的相關背景知識外，同時也涵蓋當前與脂肪組織有關研究主題的介紹。
goals: 了解及強化人體運動及身體活動時脂質代謝的相關知識
探討當前有關人體運動及身體活動時脂質代謝的研究主題及現況
發展有關人體運動及身體活動時脂質代謝的相關研究課題
syllabus:
Week 1 (2/18): Introruction 

Week 2 (2/25): The overview of adipose tissue and energy metabolism during exercise under different exercise intensity (CHO, lipid and Protein). 

Week 3 (3/4): Physical activity and exercise in the regulation of human adipose tissue physiology.

Week 4 (3/11): **Fasted and fed exercise** on lipid oxidation and intramuscular and subcutaneous adipose tissue responses. 

Week 5 (3/18): **Subcutaneous and visceral fat tissue** and effects of exercise/physical activity on both adipose tissue

Week 6 (3/25): **White adipose tissue and brown adipose tissue** (CH3/4) (Exercise-induced "browning" of adipose tissues. Lipidomic Adaptations in White and Brown Adipose Tissue in Response to Exercise Demonstrate Molecular Species-Specific Remodeling)

Week 7 (4/1): **Sex Differences** in body fat distribution (CH5) and exercise/physical activity effect on both genders

Week 8 (4/8): **In Lab**

Week 9 (4/15): **In Lab** 

Week 10 (4/22): **Lab testing (Presentation)** 

Week 11 (4/29): Adipocyte Growth and Factors Influencing Adipocyte Life Cycle and The Evolution of Mammalian Adipose Tissue (CH7/8). Effect of Exercise on Fatty Acid Metabolism and Adipokine Secretion in Adipose Tissue.

Week 12 (5/6): CH9 Dietary Determinants of Fat Mass and Body Composition and The effects of **overfeeding** and exercise on skeletal muslce and adipose tissue.

Week 13 (5/13): The effect of **caffeine** on energy metabolism (Can **caffee and tea** intake prior to exercise help to burn more fat?) and **Diet, exercise and weight control.**

Week 14 (5/20): The **Genetic** Determinants of Common Obesity-Susceptibility and Early Origins of Obesity and Developmental Regulation of Adiposity (CH10/11). Exercise training alters the genomic response to acute exercise in human adipose tissue.

Week 15 (5/27): **期末考**

Week 16 (6/3): **端午節放假**

Week 17 (6/10): **自主學習 (併入期中課後文獻整理報告繳交)**

Week 18 (6/17): **自主學習 (併入期中課後文獻整理報告繳交)**

methodologies.note: 於課堂上講述脂質結構和代謝基本知識，同時亦說明與剖析運動與身體活動對其影響。
於課堂上教師與學生針對課堂相關議題或當前脂質代謝研究課題進行討論。
教師帶領學生於運動生理學實驗室進行脂質代謝實作。
於課堂中搭配PPT及多媒體與數位教學平台等輔助教具之使用。
師生於課堂中分別針對近代脂質代謝研究課題進行實證性及綜評性等相關專題研究文獻進行報告與討論。

grading.note: 繳交脂質代謝實作結果之分析統整報告。
針對上課及相關報告主題內容進行紙筆測驗。
學生參與課堂討論程度。
近3-5年脂質代謝研究相關之綜評性文獻報告。
